p: Wei et al. isolated two flavonoid monomers, kaempferol and panasenoside, from the leaves of PQR. Meng et al. first discovered the existence of panasenoside in the root and fruit of PQR ( Meng et al., 2002). And Liu (2008). isolated panasenoside II and trifolin from PQR. Flavonoid is one of the natural active ingredients which has been widely concerned in recent years. It has the functions of anti-oxidation and sterilization At present, there are few studies on the flavonoids in PQR, and it is hoped that future scholars could pay more attention to this compound with strong pharmacological activity.
